message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand that $150 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $130. It's a great value, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget as far as I can. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
